sentence.Network_en: Civil disobedience, violent or non-violent, is intentional law breaking.
sentence.Network_cn: 公民抗命，不管是暴力还是非暴力的，都是故意犯法。

sentence.Network_en: She looked at him closely to see if his evasiveness was intentional.
sentence.Network_cn: 她端详着他，想要知道他是否故意回避。

sentence.Network_en: I'm sorry I left you off the list—it wasn't intentional.
sentence.Network_cn: 很抱歉没把你列在名单里—我不是有意的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: SAT词汇_百度文库 ... instinctive adj. 直觉的 intentional adj. 故意的 logical adj. 逻辑的.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... intention tremor 意向性震颤 intentional 有意识的 intentional accident 意向性事故.
SAT OG阅读填空题真题词汇(P390-P393)_天道留学 ... instinctive 凭本能的 intentional 有意的, 故意的 stratagem 诡计, 计谋花招.
agnostic中文 ... agnostic 不可知论者 intentional 有意图的 ... chauvinistic 沙文主义的.

list.abs: ...“Skopos“。除了Skopos，还使用了相关的“目标(aim)“、“目的(purpose)“、“意图(intention)“和“功能(function)“等词。为了避免概念混淆，提议对意图和功能作基本的区分：“意图“是从发.
法律词汇_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... 意图 intention 意向 intention 溢价 premium.
新东方六级高频词汇整理_百度文库 ... inspirational a. 灵感的 intent a. 专心的，专注的 intricate a. 复杂精细的.
六级单词表精华版 - 豆丁网 ... intensify/ vt.vi. 加强，强化 intent/ a. 目不转睛的，热切的 interact/ vi. 相互作用.

means.word_mean: 有目的的,计划的,商议的,考虑的,预计的

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'existing only in intention'): from French intentionnel or medieval Latin intentionalis, from Latin intentio(n-), from intendere (see intend)

entry.def: Something that is intentional is deliberate.

example.ex: Women who are the victims of intentional discrimination will be able to get compensation...
example.tran: 受到故意歧视的女性将会得到赔偿。

example.ex: How can I blame him? It wasn't intentional.
example.tran: 我怎么能怪他呢？那又不是有意的。

means.word_mean: 2. done or made or performed with purpose and intent;

sentences.sentence: "style...is more than the deliberate and designed creation"- Havelock Ellis

auth_sentence.content: To now say it's not intentional is absurd.
auth_sentence.res_content: To now say it's not intentional is absurd.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To now say it's not intentional is absurd.

auth_sentence.content: He underlies also the graver charge of intentional misrepresentation.
auth_sentence.res_content: He underlies also the graver charge of intentional misrepresentation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He underlies also the graver charge of intentional misrepresentation.

auth_sentence.content: It is irresponsible and in my opinion, intentional.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is irresponsible and in my opinion, intentional.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is irresponsible and in my opinion, intentional.

stems_affixes.word_buile: at加强+tent伸展,趋向+ive……的→伸展出去的→注意的,有礼貌的
intention[n.意图,意向,目的]+al表形容词→adj.有意图的, 故意的
pre前+tent伸展,趋向+ious……的→提前摆出一种姿态→做作的
attentive[adj.注意的;有礼貌的]+ly表副词→adv.注意地, 留意地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 注意,注意力;立正;特别照顾;照料
stems_affixes.word_buile: at加强+tent伸展,趋向+ion表名词→伸展出去→注意;照料

stems_affixes.value_cn: 广度,宽度,长度;程度,限度
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tent伸展,趋向→伸出去的范围→广度,宽度
intent[adj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图]+ion表名词→n.意图,意向,目的
tent伸展,趋向→伸展开用来遮雨,阳光等→帐篷

sentences.en: Let me assure you that it was not intentional.
sentences.cn: 我向你保证那不是故意的。
